    Basic component model.

    Components for the basic client/server example.

    Components for the example of a data interfaces push control pattern.
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.pre.dcc
    Dynamic remote component creation and connection for component assemblies.

      The static class Fake implements a fake component used to call the services of the component on which the plug-in is to be installed or uninstalled.

      protected static boolean AbstractComponent.checkInvariant(AbstractComponent ac)
      check the invariant of component objects.
      private void AbstractComponent.setCompositeComponentReference(AbstractComponent composite)
      sets the reference to the composite component containing immediately this component ; the composite component must have this component as subcomponent for this method to succeed otherwise an assertion exception is raised.

    • Uses of AbstractComponent in fr.sorbonne_u.components.examples.chm.components

      Subclasses of AbstractComponent in fr.sorbonne_u.components.examples.chm.components 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ConcurrentMapComponent<K,V>
      The class ConcurrentMapComponent implements a "componentised" implementation of a hash map allowing multiple readers at the same time but only one writer.
      class  TesterComponent
      The class TesterComponent tests the ConcurrentMapComponent by starting several reading tasks and one writing task.

    • Uses of AbstractComponent in fr.sorbonne_u.components.examples.cps.components

      Subclasses of AbstractComponent in fr.sorbonne_u.components.examples.cps.components 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ContinuationExamples
      The class ContinuationExamples implements a component for illustrating the use of BCM continuation-passing style.
      class  RandomValueProvider
      The class ValueProvider defines a component implementing the integer value providing service defined by the interface ValueProvidingI by returning a random int value.
      class  ValueConsumer
      The class ValueConsumer implements a component that uses the integer value providing service defined by the interface ValueProvidingI by getting ten values, computing their mean and printing the result on the terminal.

      The class DynamicURIConsumer is the dynamically deployed version of the component URIConsumer of the basic client/server example.

      class  ReflectionClient
      The class ReflectionClient defines the component that exhibits the active behaviour in the example, calling the server component reflectively to get information and change its service implementation.

      The class ReflectionServer defines the component which is the target of the example reflective processing.

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  IntegerFilter
      The class IntegerFilter implements a component that filters flows of integers.

      The class IntegerPipeline implements a composite component with a simple integer pipeline with one filtering element and one processing element.

      The class IntegerProcessor implements a component that processes flows of integers.

      The class PipelineClient implements a simple client for the pipeline component.

    • Uses of AbstractComponent in fr.sorbonne_u.components.plugins.dconnection.example.components

      Subclasses of AbstractComponent in fr.sorbonne_u.components.plugins.dconnection.example.components 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ClientSideExample
      The class ClientSideExample shows how a client component can use the dynamic connection plug-in to connect itself with a server component and call its services.
      class  ServerSideExample
      The class ServerSideExample show how a server component uses the dynamic connection plug-in to be connected with a client component and call its services.

    • Uses of AbstractComponent in fr.sorbonne_u.components.plugins.dipc.example.components

      Subclasses of AbstractComponent in fr.sorbonne_u.components.plugins.dipc.example.components 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ClientComponent
      The class ClientComponent implements a component that uses the push control of the push control plug-in to start the pushing of data from a server component and then consume these data before stopping.
      class  ServerComponent
      The class ServerComponent implements a component that offers the push control services using the corresponding plug-in.

    • Uses of AbstractComponent in fr.sorbonne_u.components.pre.dcc

      Subclasses of AbstractComponent in fr.sorbonne_u.components.pre.dcc 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DynamicComponentCreator
      The class DynamicComponentCreator defines components that will be automatically added in each of the sites of a distributed component assembly to allow for the dynamic remote creation of components on the virtual where the component is running.
